attributes.action: Enforce stricter tougher bullying restrictions in schools and colleges.
attributes.additional_details: Bullying affects 1 in 4 of us directly, and all of us in some matter or form. This needs to stop and the government need to help us.
attributes.background: Enforce schools and colleges to put strict anti-bullying policies in place. Slow schools to enforce those being accused of bullying to see apparent messages/pictures etc. Enforce schools to punish students who are bullying, make them take courses and learn about the ramifications it may have.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Schools are already required to have a behaviour policy to deal with bullying. 

https://www.gov.uk/bullying-at-school
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to change

You can find more information about bullying, including how to get help, at places like:

https://www.nationalbullyinghelpline.co.uk/

You might also be interested in this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319943
